tender.submissionMethodDetails:
A non-mandatory briefing session will be held at 9:30 AM on Tuesday 12 December 2017 to address key elements in the electronic tender instructions at Penrith Civic Centre, Nepean Room, 601 High Street Penrith 2750.

All technical questions must be asked in accordance with B.3.7.1. Technical issues with regard to the works will not be addressed at this briefing.

 


Persons intending to attend this briefing session should email the Councils Contact Officer of their intention to attend.
tender.title: RFT17/18-09, Design and Construction of three Gross Pollutant Traps (GPTs)
tender.conditionsForParticipation: All Request for Tender documents and addendums will be published via Penrith Council's Tendering Portal at https://360providers.apetsoftware.com.au/Public/pcctenders/PublicJobs.aspx
tender.description: Penrith City Council (PCC) are seeking Tenders from suitably qualified and experienced contractors, for the design and construction of three Gross Pollutant Traps (GPTs) at three different locations within the Penrith LGA.
tender.addressForLodgement: All Request for Tender documents and addendums will be published via Penrith Council's Tendering Portal at https://360providers.apetsoftware.com.au/Public/pcctenders/PublicJobs.aspxÂ
